publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3019.1 Helen Eadie: Kate Kennedy Procession, St Andrews—As an amendment to motion (S1M-3019) in the name of Mr Keith Harding, leave out from "trusts" to end and insert "hopes that one day the Kate Kennedy Club becomes open and non-discriminatory in its membership policy to truly represent the male and female students from all backgrounds who are studying at St Andrews."
S1M-3019.1 Kate Kennedy Procession, St Andrews (lodged on 30 April 2002) Tommy Sheridan*

S1M-3019.1 Helen Eadie: Kate Kennedy Procession, St Andrews—As an amendment to motion (S1M-3019) in the name of Mr Keith Harding, leave out from "trusts" to end and insert "hopes that one day the Kate Kennedy Club becomes open and non-discriminatory in its membership policy to truly represent the male and female students from all backgrounds who are studying at St Andrews." Supported by: Tommy Sheridan
S1M-3019.1 Kate Kennedy Procession, St Andrews (lodged on 30 April 2002) Michael Russell*
S1M-3019.1 Kate Kennedy Procession, St Andrews (lodged on 30 April 2002) Dr Sylvia Jackson*
